title: Balaam and the Donkey
summary: Numbers 22 introduces Balaam, a pagan prophet summoned by Balak, king of Moab, to curse Israel. God initially forbids him, then permits him to go with a warning. Along the way, Balaam’s donkey sees an angel and speaks, revealing God’s control over the situation.

faq.question: Who was Balaam?
faq.answer: A non-Israelite prophet hired by King Balak to curse Israel.

faq.question: What happened with Balaam’s donkey?
faq.answer: It saw an angel and stopped three times; then God opened its mouth to speak to Balaam.
